content: When I click #mathlib4 > trans/symm changes on the mac desktop app, I get sent to a strange place (namely "klzzwxh:0000/klzzwxh:0001 changes"). The text of the link itself is #**mathlib4>`trans`/`symm` changes**. Is anyone else experiencing this?
This is unfortunately a known bug with linking to topics with backticks.
The workaround is you can right-click on the topic to "Copy link" and paste that in instead of using the normal topic autocompleter.
